data.name: Introduction
entries: Good news! If you’ve run fifth edition, then you already understand how to use most of the creatures in this book. You may see a few unfamiliar details, but fear not: this introduction covers everything that’s new, and the tweaks we made to creature stat blocks don’t take much time at all to grok.
Beyond this introduction, this book is organized into four chapters:

{@b {@book Chapter 1: Creatures|FleeMortals|1}.} The bulk of this book contains the MCDM version of classic fantasy creatures like griffons and goblins, along with new creatures of our own design, like mournlings and valok

{@b {@book Chapter 2: Environments|FleeMortals|2}. The eight environments in this book present even more creatures! These are found in specific adventuring environments, like ruined keeps and sewers. Most environments also suggest traits and lair actions you can add to existing creatures.

{@b {@book Chapter 3: Villain Parties|FleeMortals|3}. Challenge the player characters with a party of your own! Each of the seven villain parties has five NPCs with their own stories and unique stat blocks.

{@b {@book Chapter 4: New Psionic Powers|FleeMortals|4}. If a player in your game has a talent character who uses the rules in {@i The Talent and Psionics} from MCDM, they can learn new powers from the psionic creatures in this book. You can find out more about {@i The Talent and Psionics} at mcdm.gg/talent.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The blade can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: Opportunity attacks against the blade are made with disadvantage.

trait.name: Toxiferous
entries: When a creature hits the blade with a melee attack while within 5 feet of them or touches the blade, that creature takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Machete
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Wild Hop
entries: The blade jumps a number of feet up to their walking speed. If the blade uses this bonus action to jump at least 10 feet straight toward a creature, the next Machete attack the blade makes against that creature on the same turn is made with advantage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The needler can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Sniper
entries: If the needler misses with a ranged weapon attack while they are hidden, they remain hidden. Additionally, if the needler makes a ranged weapon attack with advantage and hits, the attack deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

trait.name: Toxiferous
entries: When a creature hits the needler with a melee attack while within 5 feet of them or touches the needler, that creature takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Poison Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Blowgun
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 25/100 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage at the start of each of their turns.

bonus.name: Hop and Hide
entries: The needler jumps a number of feet up to their walking speed, then takes the Hide action.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The seer can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Third Eye
entries: Creatures within 30 feet of the seer can't hide from the seer. Creatures who can't be targeted by divination magic are immune to this effect.

trait.name: Toxiferous
entries: When a creature hits the seer with a melee attack while within 5 feet of them or touches the seer, that creature takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Acid Grasp
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage. If the target is a creature and they attack the seer before the start of the seer's next turn, the target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Refulgent Beam
entries: The seer fires two magical beams of radiant energy, each beam targeting a creature the seer can see within 120 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage and shed dim light in a 10-foot radius for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). While shedding light in this way, attack rolls against the target have advantage, the target can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}, and they can't take the Hide action.

action.name: Noxious Bubble (1/Day)
entries: The seer creates a 5-foot-radius sphere filled with toxic gas in an unoccupied space they can see within 60 feet of them. If undisturbed, this bubble lasts for 1 minute then dissipates harmlessly. If a creature attacks the bubble, touches it, enters its space, or otherwise disturbs it, the bubble bursts, and each creature within 15 feet of it must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Psychedelic Drone (1/Day)
entries: Each enemy within 60 feet of the seer who can hear them must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage and be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

bonus.name: Hop
entries: The seer jumps a number of feet up to their walking speed.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The slink can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The slink can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Toxiferous
entries: When a creature hits the slink with a melee attack while within 5 feet of them or touches the slink, that creature takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slink makes one Poison Dagger attack and one Tongue Nab attack.

action.name: Poison Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of their next turn.

action.name: Tongue Nab
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}The slink grabs one Small or Tiny object the slink can see that the target is holding or carrying. The slink can catch the object if they have a free hand, otherwise it lands at the slink's feet.

bonus.name: Hop and Hide
entries: The slink jumps a number of feet up to their walking speed, then takes the Hide action.

trait.name: Acid Burst
entries: When the tadpole is reduced to 0 hit points, their body pops, spraying acid around them. Each creature within 5 feet of the tadpole takes 1 acid damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The tadpole can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the tadpole takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the tadpole takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Noxious Skin
entries: When a creature starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more tadpoles, that creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of their next turn. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 plus the number of tadpoles within 5 feet of the creature.

action.name: Bite (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The clawfish can hold their breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage, and if the target is a Small or larger creature, the clawfish can pull themself into the target's space and attach to the target. While attached, the clawfish moves with the target without provoking opportunity attacks, and the clawfish can't make Claw attacks. A creature who can reach the clawfish can use an action to make a {@dc 12} Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check. On a success, the clawfish is detached and shunted into an unoccupied space of the clawfish's choice within 5 feet of the target. The clawfish also detaches if they become {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition prone}, or {@condition restrained}, or if they use 5 feet of movement to detach.

action.name: Electrocute {@recharge}
entries: Each creature touching the clawfish takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage. If the clawfish is immersed in water, each other creature within 10 feet of the clawfish who is touching the same body of water must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The angulotl yegg can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Signature Attack (Poison Knife)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d4} plus PB piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage. Beginning at 7th level, the yegg can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Death from Above! (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the yegg jumps up to their walking speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If they leap over an enemy during this jump, the yegg can make a signature attack with advantage against that enemy. On a hit, this attack deals an extra PB piercing damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Lay Low (3/Day)
entries: When the yegg hits a creature with a signature attack while hidden, the yegg can use their reaction to remain hidden.

action.name: 7th Level: Excoriating Acid (3/Day).
entries: As an action, the yegg throws a flask of acid at a point they can see within 20 feet of them. The flask shatters, and each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw, taking PBd10 acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The clawfish can hold their breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6} plus PB piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Overwhelming Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The clawfish makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of the clawfish's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Coiling Claws (5 Ferocity)
entries: The clawfish makes a signature attack against a Medium or smaller creature. On a hit, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the clawfish can't make a signature attack against another target.

action.name: 5th Level: Lightning Bomb (8 Ferocity)
entries: Each creature within 10 feet of the clawfish must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw, taking PBd8 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Lightning Retaliation (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the clawfish or their caregiver is attacked by a creature the clawfish can see within 5 feet of them, the clawfish shocks the attacker. The attacker must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw, taking PBd6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Exceptional Smell
entries: The bear has a +10 bonus to Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell, and they can smell creatures even through dirt, snow, and water.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The bear has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made in their native terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bear makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the bear can't use their Bite attack on another target.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Powerful Swipe {@recharge}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are shoved up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. If the target hits a solid surface, they take an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Exceptional Smell
entries: The bear has a +10 bonus to Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell, and they can smell creatures even through dirt, snow, and water.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The bear has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made in their native terrain.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, or maximum damage if the target is a Plant.

action.name: Swat
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing or bludgeoning damage (bear's choice), and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Exceptional Vision
entries: The bird has a +10 bonus to Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The bird doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they fly out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: High-Speed Dive (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the bird descends at least 30 feet on their turn, they can take the Dash action as a bonus action. When they do, they have advantage on the next attack they make before the end of their turn.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage. If the target is a Tiny creature, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). If the target is a Small or larger creature, the bird attaches to them. While attached, the bird's Beak attacks against that target are made with advantage, and the bird can't attack another target. The target or a creature who can reach them can attempt to detach the bird as an action by making a {@dc 12} Strength (Athletics) check. On a failed check, the attached target takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage. On a successful check, the attached target takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage and is no longer attached. The bird can detach by spending 5 feet of their movement.

bonus.name: Spot
entries: The bird makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

trait.name: Exceptional Vision
entries: The bird has a +10 bonus to Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The bird doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they fly out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: High-Speed Dive (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the bird descends at least 30 feet on their turn, they can take the Dash action as a bonus action. When they do, they have advantage on the next attack they make before the end of their turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bird makes two attacks using Heavy Beak, Rending Talons, or both.

action.name: Heavy Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the start of the bird's next turn.

action.name: Rending Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). While grappling a target, the bird's Beak attacks against that target are made with advantage, and the bird can't attack another target. Each time the target makes a check to end the grapple, the target takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Crushing Grip
entries: The bird's powerful talons crush a {@condition grappled} target. The target must make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the target fails the save by 5 or more, they are also {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn.

bonus.name: Spot
entries: The bird makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The camel is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining their carrying capacity.

trait.name: Desert Dweller
entries: The camel ignores difficult terrain created by dirt or sand. They can tolerate temperatures as high as 120° Fahrenheit

trait.name: Metabolic Reserves
entries: The camel can go without water for up to 7 days, and without food for up to 90 days.

trait.name: Stubborn
entries: The camel has advantage on saving throws made to avoid or end the {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, or {@condition prone} condition on themself.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Bilious Spit {@recharge 5}
entries: The camel vomits bile onto a creature they can see within 10 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). If the target fails the save by 5 or more, they are also {@condition blinded} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

monster.name: Deathhawk
languages: understands Common but can't speak it

trait.name: Corpse Sense
entries: Within a range of 5 miles, the deathhawk can sense the presence of Undead or corpses that have been dead for less than 90 days; the deathhawk knows the general direction these are in but not their exact locations. In addition, the deathhawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks made to find Undead or corpses that have been dead for less than 90 days.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The deathhawk doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they fly out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deathhawk makes one Beak attack and one Wounding Talons attack.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 3d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Wounding Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead, they gain a bleeding wound that lasts until they regain at least 1 hit point. A bleeding creature loses 5 ({@damage 1d10}) hit points for each bleeding wound they have at the start of their turn. Any creature who can reach the target can use an action to stanch all the target's wounds, ending the effect.

bonus.name: Bloodcurdling Shriek {@recharge 6}
entries: The deathhawk shrieks, and each enemy within 300 feet of the deathhawk who can hear them must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. Creatures who are immune to the {@condition frightened} condition automatically succeed on this saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is horrified for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). While horrified, each time the creature makes an attack roll or a saving throw, they must roll a {@damage d4} and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.
If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for them, they are immune to the Bloodcurdling Shriek of all deathhawks for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The eel can breathe air and water. They can survive out of water for up to 8 hours.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The eel has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid or end the {@condition grappled} condition on themself.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Electric Pulse
entries: The eel channels energy toward a creature within 20 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, made with disadvantage if the target is touching the eel. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) lightning damage and is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't dazed.

monster.name: Ancient Lightning Eel

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The eel can breathe air and water. They can survive out of water for up to 24 hours.

trait.name: Foudroyant Majesty (3/Day)
entries: When the eel fails a saving throw, they can succeed instead. When they do, they can't take the Multiattack action on their next turn.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The eel has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid or end the {@condition grappled} condition on themself.

trait.name: Stormsurge
entries: Other lightning eels within 30 feet of the ancient eel deal an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage with their weapon attacks and Electric Pulse.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eel makes one Bite attack and uses Electric Pulse.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). While {@condition grappled}, the target is {@condition restrained} and the eel can't make a Bite attack against another target.

action.name: Electric Pulse
entries: The eel channels energy toward a creature within 60 feet of them. The creature must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, made with disadvantage if the target is touching the eel. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage and is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}.

bonus.name: Coiling Storm
entries: The eel coils around a creature within 5 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}).

reaction.name: Heart of the Storm
entries: When another lightning eel that the ancient eel can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the ancient eel releases a crackling filament of lightning in their direction. The target is restored to life with 10 hit points. Each lighting eel can be restored to life only once with this reaction.

legendaryHeader: The eel has three villain actions. They can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. They can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Call to the Storm
entries: Every other lightning eel within 30 feet of the ancient eel can use their Electric Pulse action as a reaction.

legendary.name: Action 2: Electric Rush
entries: The eel surges with lightning, moves up to their speed, then makes a Bite attack. On a hit, the Bite attack deals an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) lightning damage. A creature who hits the eel with a melee attack during this movement takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning damage.

legendary.name: Action 3: Fulminous Wave
entries: The eel releases a crackling wave of electricity and uses Electric Pulse against each enemy within 30 feet of them.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The snowfox has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made in snowy terrain or cloudy skies.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The snowfox doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they leave an enemy's reach.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 piercing damage, and the snowfox attaches to the target. While attached, the snowfox's Claw attacks against that target are made with advantage, and the snowfox can't attack another target. The target or a creature who can reach them can detach the snowfox as an action with a successful {@dc 13} Strength (Athletics) check. The snowfox can detach by spending 5 feet of their movement.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 slashing damage.

bonus.name: Burrow
entries: The snowfox burrows up to 5 feet in snow.

bonus.name: Listen
entries: The snowfox makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

trait.name: Multitudinous
entries: The swarm has advantage on opportunity attacks, and creatures provoke opportunity attacks from the swarm even if they take the Disengage action before leaving the swarm's reach.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage if the swarm has half their hit points or fewer.

action.name: Distracting Buzz
entries: If the swarm has at least half their hit points remaining, they emit an annoying drone, buzz, or skittering sound. Until the start of the swarm's next turn, creatures within 15 feet of the swarm who can hear them have disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than the swarm.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny spider. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The swarm ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage, or 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage if the swarm has half their hit points or fewer.

action.name: Too Many Legs
entries: The swarm mobs a creature in their space and attaches to them. When the swarm takes damage other than psychic damage, the attached creature also takes half as much damage. The attached creature has disadvantage on attacks against creatures other than the swarm, and attacks against the attached creature have advantage.

While attached, the swarm can't attack another target. The attached creature or another creature who can reach them can shake off the swarm and detach them as an action. The swarm can detach by spending 5 feet of their movement.

trait.name: Hunter's Pounce
entries: If the wildcat hits a Large or smaller target and had advantage on the attack roll, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). While grappling the target in this way, the wildcat can't attack another creature.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The wildcat has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made in their native terrain.

trait.name: Sprint (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the wildcat moves on their turn in combat, they can triple their speed until the end of their turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, plus an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage if the target is {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, plus an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage if the wildcat had advantage on the attack roll.

bonus.name: Sneak
entries: The wildcat takes the Hide action.

trait.name: Agile Landing
entries: The wildcat takes no damage from falling 40 feet or less, provided they aren't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Hunter's Pounce
entries: If the wildcat hits a Small or smaller target and had advantage on the attack roll, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). While grappling the target in this way, the wildcat can't attack another creature.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The wildcat has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made in their native terrain.

trait.name: Sprint (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the wildcat moves on their turn in combat, they can triple their speed until the end of their turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage, plus an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage if the target is {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage, plus an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage if the wildcat had advantage on the attack roll.

bonus.name: Sneak
entries: The wildcat takes the Hide action.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Exceptional Smell
entries: The bear's proficiency bonus is doubled for Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell, and they can smell creatures even through dirt, snow, and water.

trait.name: Familiar Territory
entries: The bear has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) and Wisdom (Survival) checks made in their native terrain (as determined by you and the GM).

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite or Claw)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6} plus PB piercing damage (Bite) or slashing damage (Claw).

action.name: 1st Level: Tenacious Strike (2 Ferocity).
entries: The bear makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage. On a miss, the bear deals PB slashing damage to the target and gains 2 ferocity.

action.name: 3rd Level: Pummel (5 Ferocity).
entries: The bear makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the bear's attacks (including the triggering attack) deal an extra PB damage, the target is {@condition restrained} if they are Large or smaller, and the bear can't make a signature attack against another target.

action.name: 5th Level: Clawing Frenzy (8 Ferocity).
entries: The bear makes a signature Claw attack against PB creatures of their choice within 5 feet of them. At the end of their turn, the bear gains 1 ferocity for every attack that missed.

bonus.name: Hunt by Scent
entries: The bear detects the location of each living creature within 10 × PB feet of them, unless the creature is hiding their scent by supernatural means.

hp.special: 6 + six times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Signature Attack (Beak)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6} plus PB piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Distracting Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The hawk makes a signature attack. On a hit, the next attack made against the target before the start of the hawk's next turn has advantage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Swooping Attack (5 Ferocity)
entries: The hawk moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or after this move, they can make a signature attack against one target. On a hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or drop one item they are holding.

action.name: 5th Level: Storm of Talons (8 Ferocity)
entries: The hawk moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks, then they can dive onto one creature within 5 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes PBd10 slashing damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of the hawk's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

reaction.name: Swoop In (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: When the hawk's caregiver is hit with an attack while the hawk is within 30 feet of them, the hawk moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If the hawk ends this movement within 5 feet of the caregiver, the hawk becomes the target of the triggering attack instead, and the attack deals half as much damage.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The camel is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining their carrying capacity.

trait.name: Desert Dweller
entries: The camel ignores difficult terrain created by dirt or sand. They can tolerate temperatures as high as 120° Fahrenheit.

trait.name: Metabolic Reserves
entries: The camel can go without water for up to 7 days, and without food for up to 90 days.

trait.name: Stubborn
entries: The camel has advantage on saving throws made to avoid or end the {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, or {@condition prone} condition on themself.

trait.name: Tall and Narrow
entries: If the camel's caregiver is Medium or smaller, the caregiver can occupy the camel's space and vice versa, and it doesn't count as difficult terrain for them.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite or Kick)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack:
+3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6} plus PB piercing damage (Bite) or bludgeoning damage (Kick).

action.name: 1st Level: Bilious Spit (2 Ferocity)
entries: The camel spits at a creature they can see within 10 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the camel's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Punishing Shake (5 Ferocity)
entries: The camel moves up to their speed and makes a signature Bite attack against one target. If the attack hits and the target is Medium or smaller, the camel also shakes and flings them up to 10 feet away horizontally. If the target hits a solid surface, they are knocked {@condition prone} and take an extra PB bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Trample (8 Ferocity)
entries: The camel moves up to their speed. During this move, they can move through other creature's spaces. Each Large or smaller creature whose space the camel passes through must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes PBd6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Ungulate Urgency
entries: If the camel's caretaker falls {@condition prone} and the camel can see them, the camel moves up to their speed toward their caregiver. If they end this movement in the same space as their caregiver, attacks against the caregiver have disadvantage until either the caregiver is no longer {@condition prone}, the caregiver is no longer in the same space as the camel, or the start of the camel's next turn, whichever comes first.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Familiar Territory
entries: The wildcat has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) and Wisdom (Survival) checks made in their native terrain (as determined by you and the GM).

trait.name: Predator's Grab (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the wildcat hits a creature with an opportunity attack, the creature is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}).

trait.name: Sprint (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the wildcat moves on their turn in combat, they can triple their speed until the end of their turn.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite or Claw)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack:
+3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6} plus PB piercing damage (Bite) or slashing damage (Claw).

action.name: 1st Level: Crushing Jaws (2 Ferocity)
entries: The wildcat makes a signature Bite attack, dealing an extra PB bludgeoning damage on a hit, or an extra 2 × PB bludgeoning damage to a target they are grappling.

action.name: 3rd Level: Pounce (5 Ferocity)
entries: The wildcat moves up to their speed and makes a signature attack against one target, dealing an extra PB damage on a hit. If the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}), and the wildcat can't attack another creature until the grapple ends.

action.name: 5th Level: Shredding Claws (8 Ferocity)
entries: The wildcat makes three signature Claw attacks against the same target. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the wildcat for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

trait.name: Alchemical Ingredients
entries: After the basilisk dies, a creature can make a {@dc 12} Wisdom (Medicine) check using an herbalism kit and the basilisk's gullet, destroying the gullet in the process. On a success, the creature creates three doses of a salve. One dose of this salve can be applied to a {@condition petrified} creature as an action, and 1 minute after the salve is applied, the {@condition petrified} condition ends for that creature.

trait.name: Toxic Ichor
entries: A creature who deals piercing or slashing damage to the basilisk while within 5 feet of them takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The basilisk uses Petrifying Eye Beams and makes one Bite attack or uses Poison Fumes, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Petrifying Eye Beams
entries: The basilisk targets one or two creatures they can see within 30 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition restrained} as they magically begin to turn to stone. Until the end of the {@condition restrained} creature's next turn, they or an ally within 5 feet of them can use an action to cut the encroaching stone from the {@condition restrained} creature's body using a weapon that deals slashing damage. When they do, the {@condition restrained} creature takes 13 ({@damage 2d12}) slashing damage, which can't be reduced in any way, and they are no longer {@condition restrained}.

A creature {@condition restrained} in this way must repeat the saving throw at the end of their turn. On a successful save, the effect ends. On a failed save, this creature is {@condition petrified} until freed by a cure ailment power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect.

action.name: Poison Fumes {@recharge 4}
entries: The basilisk exhales poisonous fumes in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in this area must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 4d4}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Poison Splash
entries: When the basilisk takes piercing or slashing damage, their wound spews poison. Each creature within 10 feet of the basilisk must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d6} plus PB piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Poison Spittle (2 Ferocity)
entries: The basilisk makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage, and a different creature the basilisk chooses within 5 feet of them takes PB poison damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Poison Gaze (5 Ferocity)
entries: The basilisk chooses up to three creatures they can see within 15 feet of them. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the basilisk's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Lesser Petrifying Eye Beams (8 Ferocity)
entries: The basilisk targets one creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition restrained} as they magically begin to turn to stone. A creature {@condition restrained} in this way must repeat the saving throw at the end of their turn. On a successful save, the effect ends. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition petrified} for 1 hour or until freed by a cure ailment power, {@spell lesser restoration} spell, or similar supernatural effect.

reaction.name: Heavy Glare
entries: When a creature who can see the basilisk is hit by an attack by the basilisk's caregiver, the basilisk forces that creature to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target can't make opportunity attacks and has their speed reduced by 10 feet until the start of their next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the channeler can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Bugbear's Inspiration
entries: Allied Humanoids within 15 feet of the channeler who can see or hear them have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The channeler makes two Channeling Staff attacks.

action.name: Channeling Staff
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the channeler can move them up to 10 feet horizontally.

action.name: Vine Eruption (3/Day; 4th-Level Spell)
entries: The channeler attempts to use primal magic to overload a creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw as thorny vines erupt from their body and attempt to envelop them. On a failed save, the target takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) piercing damage and is {@condition restrained} until the vines are destroyed. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained}. A creature {@condition restrained} in this way takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage at the start of each of their turns. The vines have AC 15, 10 hit points, and immunity to psychic damage.

action.name: Ball Lightning (1/Day; 7th-Level Spell; Concentration)
entries: The channeler creates a 20-foot-radius sphere of electricity centered on a point they can see within 120 feet of them. The sphere lasts for 1 minute. When an enemy starts their turn in that area, they must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage. As a bonus action, the channeler can move the sphere up to 20 feet.

reaction.name: Shared Shield (2/Day; 2nd-Level Spell)
entries: When a creature the channeler can see within 30 feet of them is hit with an attack, the channeler can create a barrier of magical force around that target. Until the start of the channeler's next turn, the target gains a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack.

trait.name: Commander's Inspiration
entries: Allied Humanoids within 30 feet of the commander who can see or hear them have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws and gain a +1 bonus to weapon attack and damage rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The commander makes two Greatsword or two Longbow attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, and one ally within 30 feet of the target who can see the commander has advantage on their next melee attack roll made against the target before the start of the commander's next turn.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bark Orders {@recharge}
entries: Each ally within 60 feet of the commander who can hear and understand them can use a reaction to move up to their speed and make a weapon attack.

reaction.name: Bolstering Pride
entries: When another creature within 60 feet of the commander who can hear and understand them makes a saving throw, the commander can give that creature advantage on the saving throw.

trait.name: Bugbear's Inspiration
entries: Allied Humanoids within 15 feet of the predator who can see or hear them have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws.

trait.name: Dirty Fighting
entries: When the predator hits a creature with a melee weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The predator makes two Curved Dagger or two Longbow attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, the predator has advantage on their next attack roll made against the target before the end of the predator's next turn.

action.name: Curved Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Go for the Eyes (1/Day)
entries: Each ally within 30 feet of the predator who can hear and understand them gains the predator's Dirty Fighting trait until the start of the predator's next turn.

bonus.name: Guerilla Training
entries: The predator takes the Dash or Hide action.

trait.name: Bodyblock
entries: When a Medium or smaller enemy is within 5 feet of three or more regulars who aren't {@condition prone} or {@condition incapacitated}, that enemy can't see beyond a range of 15 feet.

trait.name: Bugbear's Encouragement
entries: Allied Humanoids within 5 feet of the regular who can see or hear them gain a cumulative +1 bonus to Wisdom saving throws.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the regular takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to
If the regular takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Bullyclub (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Bugbear's Inspiration
entries: Allied Humanoids within 15 feet of the roughneck who can see or hear them have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack (Battle Fury Only)
entries: The roughneck makes two Handaxe attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bugbear Battle Cry (1/Day)
entries: Each ally within 15 feet of the roughneck who can hear and understand them gains advantage on attack rolls until the start of the roughneck's next turn.

bonus.name: Battle Fury (1/Day)
entries: The roughneck enters a furious state that lasts for 1 minute. While in this state, the roughneck can take the Multiattack action on their turn, and they have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from mundane attacks.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Signature Attack (Spiked Bow)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 2d6} plus PB piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the warden can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Halting Shot (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the warden makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Presence of Inspiration (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the warden inspires each ally within 30 feet of them who can hear them, granting them advantage on attack rolls until the start of the warden's next turn.

action.name: 7th Level: Enraged Barrage (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the warden makes a signature attack. Each ally within 30 feet of them who can see them can use a reaction to make a weapon attack, cast a cantrip with a casting time of 1 action, or manifest a 1st-order power with a manifestation time of 1 action.

monster.name: Chimera
languages: understands any one language but can't speak

trait.name: Volant
entries: When the chimera reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the chimera can move up to their speed toward an enemy they can see.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chimera makes three Bite attacks. They can replace one attack with a Lion's Toss attack or a use of Dragon's Eruption, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Lion's Toss
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be moved up to 20 feet in any direction.

action.name: Dragon's Eruption {@recharge}
entries: The chimera spits a volcanic explosion at a point they can see within 120 feet of them. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Roar
entries: Each enemy who can hear the chimera and is within 60 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the chimera for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). If a creature succeeds on a saving throw against this effect or if the effect ends for them, the creature is immune to the chimera's Roar for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Ram's Defiance
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the chimera misses them with an attack, the chimera can move up to half their speed in a straight line toward the creature. If the chimera ends this movement within 5 feet of the creature, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d6} plus PB piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Ram's Defense (2 Ferocity)
entries: The chimera makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack imposes disadvantage on the target's next attack roll made before the start of the chimera's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Lion's Leap (5 Ferocity)
entries: The chimera moves up to half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If they end this movement on the ground, each creature within 5 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 5th Level: Volcanic Blow (8 Ferocity)
entries: The chimera spits an explosion of fire at a point they can see within 60 feet of them. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw, taking PBd6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Protective Absorption (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the chimera's caregiver takes damage while within 60 feet of the chimera, half the damage taken (rounded up) is transferred to the chimera.

trait.name: Lethe
entries: While the chimeron's soul count is 0, they have advantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on saving throws, and their Intelligence score becomes 3 (-4). Additionally, the chimeron must use their movement on each of their turns to move as close as possible to the nearest creature they can sense with their soulsight, and then if they are able, they must use their action to attack and attempt to kill that creature. The chimeron can't act with any other purpose until they add 1 to their soul count.

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: When the chimeron reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the chimeron consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to the chimeron's soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

trait.name: Soul Resistance
entries: While the chimeron's soul count is is 2 or higher, they have advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chimeron makes up to three attacks using

action.name: Powerful Bite, Scorching Bite, Booming Bite, or Chilling Bite
entries: They can't use any attack more than once.

action.name: Powerful Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Scorching Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage, and the target is set on fire until the target or a creature who can reach them uses an action to extinguish the flames. A creature who is on fire at the start of their turn takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. If a creature who is already on fire is set on fire again on a subsequent turn, the damage isn't cumulative.

action.name: Booming Bite (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Chilling Bite (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage, the target's speed is halved until the end of their next turn, and they can only make one attack during their next turn.

reaction.name: Pain Absorption (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: When the chimeron takes damage, they reduce the damage taken by 16 ({@dice 3d10}).

trait.name: Horrid Stench
entries: If an enemy starts their turn within 10 feet of three or more pitlings, the enemy is {@condition poisoned} until the start of their next turn.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the pitling takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the pitling takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Soul Feast
entries: When the pitling reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the pitling consumes the creature's soul, and the pitling becomes a Category 2 demon of the GM's choice with 1 soul. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell. If the creature was reduced to 0 hit points by a group attack, the GM picks one pitling who joined the attack to consume the soul.

action.name: Spit (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 15/30 ft., one target. {@h}4 poison damage.

trait.name: Lethe
entries: When the ruinant's soul count is 0, they have advantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on saving throws, and their Intelligence score becomes 3 (-4). Additionally, the ruinant must use their movement on each of their turns to move as close as possible to the nearest creature they can sense with their soulsight, and then if they are able, they must use their action to attack and attempt to kill that creature. The ruinant can't act with any other purpose until they add 1 to their soul count.

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: When the ruinant reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the ruinant consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to the ruinant's soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ruinant makes three Bloodletting Claws attacks.

action.name: Bloodletting Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage, and the target can't take reactions this turn.

action.name: Salt Wounds (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: The ruinant chooses up to three creatures they can see within 60 feet of them who don't have all their hit points. Each target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Corrupt Healing (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: When a creature within 60 feet of the ruinant regains hit points from a power, a spell, or a similar supernatural effect, the ruinant corrupts the effect. The target regains no hit points, and the target and each of the ruinant's enemies within 5 feet of the ruinant must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take necrotic damage equal to half the number of hit points the effect would have restored.

trait.name: Lethe
entries: When the tormenauk's soul count is 0, they have advantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on saving throws, and their Intelligence score becomes 3 (-4). Additionally, the tormenauk must use their movement on each of their turns to move as close as possible to the nearest creature they can sense with their soulsight, and then if they are able, they must use their action to attack and attempt to kill that creature. The tormenauk can't act with any other purpose until they add 1 to their soul count.

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: When the tormenauk reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the tormenauk consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to the tormenauk's soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tormenauk makes two Slam attacks and one Many Maws attack.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}), and they are {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The tormenauk can grapple up to two targets at a time.

action.name: Many Maws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target {@condition grappled} by the tormenauk. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Agony Wail (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: The tormenauk screeches, broadcasting a consumed soul's lifelong pain. Each creature within 30 feet of the tormenauk who can hear them must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures who knew the owner of the burned soul have disadvantage on the saving throw.

reaction.name: Share Agony (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: When the tormenauk takes damage, they choose a creature they can see within 30 feet of them to share the pain. The target must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw, taking psychic damage equal to the triggering damage taken by the tormenauk on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Lethe
entries: When the wobalas's soul count is 0, they have advantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on saving throws, and their Intelligence score becomes 3 (-4). Additionally, the wobalas must use their movement on each of their turns to move as close as possible to the nearest creature they can sense with their soulsight, and then if they are able, they must use their action to attack and attempt to kill that creature. The wobalas can't act with any other purpose until they add 1 to their soul count.

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: When the wobalas reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the wobalas consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to the wobalas's soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wobalas makes three Despair Bolt attacks.

action.name: Despair Bolt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage. The wobalas can burn 1 soul to make the target {@condition frightened} of them for 1 minute. If the target is immune to being {@condition frightened}, the wobalas regains the burned soul.

action.name: Banishing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage, and the target is teleported up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space the wobalas can see.

bonus.name: Flee, Mortal (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: The wobalas chooses a creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or use their reaction, if available, to move their speed away from the wobalas by the most direct route possible, with no regard for their own safety. Creatures who can't be {@condition frightened} succeed on this saving throw automatically.

monster.name: Aurumvas

trait.name: Abyssal Resistance (Costs 2 Souls)
entries: When Aurumvas fails a saving throw, he succeeds instead.

trait.name: Lethe
entries: When Aurumvas's soul count is 0, he has advantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on saving throws, and his Intelligence score becomes 3 (-4). Additionally, Aurumvas must use his movement on each of his turns to move as close as possible to the nearest creature he can sense with his soulsight, and then if he is able, he must use his action to attack and attempt to kill that creature. Aurumvas can't act with any other purpose until he adds 1 to his soul count.

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: When Aurumvas reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, Aurumvas consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to his soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

trait.name: Soul Weapons
entries: While Aurumvas's soul count is 2 or higher, his weapon attacks are magical, and allies within 60 feet of him deal an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) psychic damage with weapon attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Aurumvas makes three attacks using Greedy Hands, Covetous Bolt, or both.

action.name: Greedy Hands
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage. Aurumvas can burn 1 soul to gain temporary hit points equal to the psychic damage dealt.

action.name: Covetous Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 11} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 5d8}) force damage. If the target has spell slots, Aurumvas can burn 2 souls to force the target to expend their highest-level spell slot available with no effect.

bonus.name: Greed Is Good
entries: Aurumvas chooses an object he can see within 30 feet of him that is worth at least 100 gp. He teleports to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of that object.

reaction.name: Absorb Soul
entries: If a demon with a soul count of 1 or higher who Aurumvas can see dies within 60 feet of him, Aurumvas gains 1 soul.

legendaryHeader: Aurumvas has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Time Is Money
entries: Aurumvas warps time with his supernatural greed. Each ally he can see within 120 feet of him moves up to their speed. At the end of this round of combat, Aurumvas rearranges the initiative order in any way he chooses.

legendary.name: Action 2: That's Ours
entries: Aurumvas chooses up to three magic items he can see within 30 feet of him that aren't artifacts or of legendary rarity and that don't require attunement. He teleports each item to an ally who he can see within 30 feet of him, placing it either into their hands or at their feet. If a targeted object is being worn or carried by an enemy, the enemy can make a {@dc 19} Charisma saving throw, preventing that object from being teleported on a success.

legendary.name: Action 3: At Any Cost
entries: Aurumvas teleports Tiny explosive treasures from his vault to four different points he can see within 120 feet of him. Each creature within 10 feet of one or more of these points must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: True Name
entries: If a creature the adjudicator can hear within 60 feet of them speaks the adjudicator's true name aloud, the adjudicator loses their damage resistances, damage immunities, and Devilish Charm reaction for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The adjudicator makes two Infernal Injunction attacks and uses Adjudicator's Interdiction, if available.

action.name: Infernal Injunction
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d8 + 5}) fire damage, and the target must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the adjudicator chooses for the target to become either {@condition charmed} by or {@condition frightened} of them until the end of the target's next turn.

action.name: Adjudicator's Interdiction {@recharge 5}
entries: The adjudicator places an infernal seal on one creature they can see within 120 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw or be interdicted until the adjudicator dies. While interdicted, a creature's speed is halved, they can't take reactions, and they can't regain hit points. A cure ailment power, a {@spell lesser restoration} or {@spell remove curse} spell, or a similar supernatural effect ends the effect early.

action.name: Bad Deal (1/Day)
entries: Three creatures the adjudicator can see within 60 feet of them must make a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target must choose to either take a -5 penalty to AC or a -5 penalty to ability checks and attack rolls. This penalty lasts for 10 minutes (save ends at end of turn).

reaction.name: Devilish Charm (2/Day)
entries: When the adjudicator is targeted by an attack, power, spell, or other supernatural effect by a creature they can see within 60 feet of them, the creature must make a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the adjudicator until the start of the creature's next turn, and the adjudicator chooses a new target the adjudicator can see for the triggering effect. The new target must be within the triggering effect's range.

trait.name: Hellfire
entries: Fire damage dealt by the jurist ignores damage resistance.

trait.name: True Name
entries: If a creature the jurist can hear within 60 feet of them speaks the jurist's true name aloud, the jurist loses their damage resistances, damage immunities, and Devilish Charm reaction for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The jurist makes two Fire and Brim stone attacks.

action.name: Fire and Brimstone
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or gain one festering wound. A creature takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage at the start of each of their turns for each festering wound they have. A creature who receives supernatural healing loses all festering wounds.

action.name: Inferno {@recharge 5}
entries: The jurist makes one Fire and Brimstone attack against each enemy they can see within 60 feet of them.

bonus.name: Ashes to Ashes
entries: The jurist chooses a creature they can see within 120 feet of them who has one or more festering wounds. One of the target's wounds ignites and they take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Devilish Charm (1/Day)
entries: When the jurist is targeted by an attack, power, spell, or other supernatural effect by a creature they can see within 60 feet of them, the creature must make a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the jurist until the start of the creature's next turn, and the jurist chooses a new target the jurist can see for the triggering effect. The new target must be within the triggering effect's range.

trait.name: Hellish Resistance
entries: While in Hell or within 60 feet of a devil with a challenge rating of 9 or higher, the legate has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

trait.name: True Name
entries: If a creature the legate can hear within 60 feet of them speaks the legate's true name aloud, the legate loses their damage resistances, damage immunities, and Devilish Charm reaction for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The legate makes two Infernal Pike attacks.

action.name: Infernal Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage, and the legate chooses one of the following effects:

action.name: Focused Hate
entries: The target has disadvantage on attack rolls made against creatures other than the legate until the end of the legate's next turn.

action.name: Hellbite
entries: The target takes an extra 5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage.

action.name: Skewer
entries: The legate deals 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage to another creature within 5 feet of the target.

reaction.name: Devilish Charm (1/Day)
entries: When the legate is targeted by an attack, power, spell, or other supernatural effect by a creature they can see within 60 feet of them, the creature must make a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the legate until the start of the creature's next turn, and the legate chooses a new target the legate can see for the triggering effect. The new target must be within the triggering effect's range.

trait.name: True Name
entries: If a creature the magistrate can hear within 60 feet of them speaks the magistrate's true name aloud, the magistrate loses their damage resistances, damage immunities, and Devilish Charm reaction for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The magistrate makes two Infernal Knife attacks and one Obsidian Kris attack.

action.name: Infernal Knife
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage, and the target is {@condition frightened} of their allies until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Obsidian Kris
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage, and if the target is {@condition frightened}, they can't take reactions until the {@condition frightened} condition ends for them.

reaction.name: Devilish Charm (2/Day)
entries: When the magistrate is targeted by an attack, power, spell, or other supernatural effect by a creature they can see within 60 feet of them, the creature must make a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the magistrate until the start of the creature's next turn, and the magistrate chooses a new target the magistrate can see for the triggering effect. The new target must be within the triggering effect's range.

trait.name: Importunity
entries: At the start of the notary's turn, they can grant an infernal blessing to a non-minion ally they can see within 60 feet of them (no action required). The next time that ally makes an attack roll or saving throw before the start of the notary's next turn, the ally can add a +1 bonus to the roll. This bonus increases by 1 (maximum bonus of +5) for each notary who grants an infernal blessing to the creature.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the notary takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the notary takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: True Name
entries: If a creature the notary can hear within 60 feet of them speaks the notary's true name aloud, the notary loses their damage immunities and Importunity trait for 24 hours.

action.name: Brimstone (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. {@h}4 fire damage.

monster.name: Infernal Chancellor Lazivos

trait.name: Security for Speed (3/Day)
entries: When Lazivos fails a saving throw, he can succeed instead. When he does, his speed is halved and he can't take bonus actions or reactions until the end of his next turn.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: Lazivos has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

trait.name: True Name
entries: If a creature Lazivos can hear within 60 feet of him speaks his true name aloud, Lazivos loses his damage resistances, damage immunities, and Devilish Charm reaction for 24 hours. Lazivos's true name is Minto Abi.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lazivos makes three attacks using Infernal Rapier, Chancellor's Decree, or both.

action.name: Infernal Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage, and the target is marked with an infernal sigil until the end of their next turn. While marked, a creature can't hide or benefit from being {@condition invisible}, and attack rolls against them have advantage.

action.name: Chancellor's Decree
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) psychic damage, and the target must make a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition charmed} by Lazivos until the end of his next turn or until Lazivos or one of his allies harms the target.

action.name: Diabolic Deposition {@recharge 5}
entries: On a failed save, a creature must choose to either take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage or be dazed for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a creature must either choose to take half as much damage or be dazed until the end of their next turn. Succeed or fail, if a creature is already dazed, they must choose the damage

bonus.name: As I Say
entries: Lazivos commands a creature {@condition charmed} by him to use their reaction, if available, to make a weapon attack against a target of his choice.

reaction.name: Devilish Charm
entries: When Lazivos is targeted by an attack, power, spell, or other supernatural effect by a creature he can see within 60 feet of him, the creature must make a {@dc 20} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by Lazivos until the start of the creature's next turn, and Lazivos chooses a new target he can see for the triggering effect. The new target must be within the triggering effect's range.

legendaryHeader: Lazivos has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Welcome, Friends
entries: Lazivos invokes an infernal word of power. Up to three enemies within 60 feet of him who can hear him must make a {@dc 20} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition charmed} by Lazivos for 1 hour (save ends at end of turn) or until Lazivos or one of his allies harms the target. On a successful save, a target takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage.

legendary.name: Action 2: Heed My Commands!
entries: Lazivos and each ally within 60 feet of him moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. Each creature {@condition charmed} by Lazivos moves up to half their speed in a direction he chooses (no action required).

legendary.name: Action 3: Deceptive Stratagem
entries: Lazivos switches places with a willing creature of his choice within 120 feet of him. Immediately afterward, up to five creatures of Lazivos's choice within 120 feet of him can make a melee attack (no action required).

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Signature Attack (Daggers)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}{@damage 2d4 + PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the retainer can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Misleading Strike (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the retainer makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target must use their reaction, if available, to make a weapon attack against a creature of the retainer's choice.

action.name: 5th Level: Adjuration (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the retainer grants an infernal blessing to an ally they can see within 60 feet of them. The next time that ally makes an attack roll before the start of the retainer's next turn, the ally adds a +PB bonus to the roll. If the attack hits, it deals an extra PB damage.

action.name: 7th Level: Hellbitten Knives (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the retainer imbues their daggers with hellfire. For 1 minute, their signature attack deals an extra PB fire damage and ignores damage resistances.

trait.name: Arcane Acumen
